workshop.title: Data Science Acceleration
workshop.description: Learn how to use R environment with Oracle Big Data Cloud Service - Compute Edition and Oracle Storage Cloud Object Store

labs.title: Read Me First
labs.description: Overview of the Data Science Acceleration User Journey

labs.title: Lab 100: START HERE - Provisioning
labs.description: Instructions to provision Oracle Big Data Cloud Service - Compute Edition (BDCS-CE) in your Oracle Public Cloud identity domain for use with this journey

labs.title: Lab 200: Setup R and BDCS-CE
labs.description: Setup and configure your R environment and tools with BDCS-CE

labs.title: Lab 300: R and Zeppelin
labs.description: Use R, SparkR, BDCS-CE and Oracle Storage Cloud Object Store to analyze data and store results

labs.title: Lab 400: R and RStudio Server
labs.description: Use RStudio Server to work with BDCS-CE and Oracle Storage Cloud Object Store

labs.title: Lab 500: More R and Object Store
labs.description: Download, install, and use R package to simplify working with the Oracle Storage Cloud Object Store

labs.title: Cleanup
labs.description: Instructions to cleanup your cloud service environment.
